name: Knights of the Chalice Demo
description:
Knights of the Chalice Free Demo / Tutorial: this is a unique adventure.

A haunted forest. Strange ruins. The villagers call this place “Devil’s Lair”. The ruins may be
dead, so they say, but the sinister, malevolent creatures that lurk underneath most certainly
are not.
Tightening your packs, you reflect upon this. The devil’s lair, Hah! How could any selfrespecting
adventurer shy away from the golden opportunity? In this short adventure, the
player characters are pre-created and start at level 3.


For more information, please visit www.heroicfantasygames.com. Thank you for reading!
